item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Hi! Thank you for coming to my website. ðŸ™‹ My name is Diana (Yenan) Guan, analyst in the data science team in a digital marketing company. Exploring my career in applying data techniques in product and growth My interests in data science and telling data stories comes from Econometrics course in university Working experiences in industries including digital marketing, healthcare, insurance Every-workday life with Python, R, SQL, Tableau Actively applying statistics & machine learning to innovate on working process Master of Science in Customer Analytics in Washington University, Olin Business School Received First Honours degree in BSc Mathematical Economics and Statistics in University of Birmingham (UK) Who am I besides that?
